title: Don't Bring Urf Back
body: Despite the massive outcry whenever it's gone for extended periods of time, people will always get so irredeemably toxic over it. 4 games in a row of URF where it's just.. nonstop /all rage. Harassing enemy team, ally team, just shittalking in general. This is actually awful. Game mode's fun, but it doesn't fit our community.

replies.body: lol he downvoted all of the comments

me? no, i can prove that i didn't touch them. 

http://prntscr.com/k4kzvx

"oh but you just removed your downvote--"

nope.

ok they were at 0 when I saw them I upvoted to 1, and now they are 2
are u actually serious? dont play the fucking mode then, people are going to be toxic regardless if the mode is there are not.

That happens in normals and ranked too.

Some people just suck.

Dont play URF.

Why should nobody else get it just because you dont like it?

I liked the ORIGINAL one, yes it was fucked up to hell and broken.
but anytime Riot changes something, you know it ain't gonna be as much fun after.


AMIRITE?
